column2: Look who it is, another spoiled brat from the woke generation!
I don’t identify as a woman
Stop making up nonsense! Of course, you’re a woman, and an ugly one at that, hehehehe
So, what do you even call yourself? One of those "confused" people?
Confusion is not knowing which beer to pick, hehe
The way I live doesn’t change your life, and if you want, I can explai-
Ain’t nothin’ I don’t already know! You should just go clean your house, fix that hair… y’know, women stuff
Why act like this? Especially knowing you’re only here because of a woman?!
Think I'll have to teach another woman some good maners
